flags.name: PLATFORM
flags.description: Indicates the target Platform.

flags.name: GRAPHICS_API
flags.description: Indicates the target Graphics API

flags.name: SHUTTER_GL_VERSION
flags.description: Indicates the Specific Opengl Version that Target will be using. Possible values - 2,3

flags.name: ENABLE_LOGGING
flags.description: Enables and Disables Logging

flags.name: ENABLE_EVENTS
flags.description: Enables and Disables events reporting for clients

flags.name: ENABLE_ASSERTS
flags.description: Enables and Disables failed assertion reporting

flags.name: MODEL_LOADING
flags.description: Enables/Disables model loading and rendering feature

flags.name: SHUTTER_AI_CAMERA
flags.description: Indicates the whether AI module should be enabled/disabled

flags.name: MATERIALS_POC_IOS
flags.description: Testing 3D mesh with material rendering on iOS

flags.name: ENABLE_NORMALS
flags.description: CRT-3019: Enables/Disables vertex 'normals' support for Mesh

flags.name: VE_IV_TEMPLATE
flags.description: CRT-3025 : Image Video Mix for VideoEditor

flags.name: ENABLE_DEPTH16
flags.description: Enable/Disable Depth16 image format support

flags.name: ENABLE_DEPTH32_STENCIL8
flags.description: Enable/Disable Depth32, Stensil8 image format support

flags.name: TEXTURE_CUBEMAP
flags.description: Enable creation of texture cubemap

flags.name: MAC_UI_ARCHITECTURE
flags.description: Retained mode UI Architecture(For ImGUI) setup for Design Studio applications

flags.name: DS_BLACKFRAME_EXPORT_ISSUE
flags.description: Bug - Image and video sometimes getting exported completely black

flags.name: DS_ICONS_MANAGER
flags.description: Configuring assets for MV and Lens studio applications separately

flags.name: C_SCRIPTING
flags.description: Experimenting with scripting in Shutter

flags.name: MATERIAL_DEPTH_FLAG
flags.description: Adding Material Depth Flag in Shutter Material

flags.name: TEXTURE_CONVERTOR_FLAG
flags.description: Adding Texture Convertor for Android OPENGL_OES_TEXTURE to TEXTURE2D Conversion

flags.name: COLOR_FILTER_TOOL
flags.description: its color filter application

flags.name: CAMERA_PREVIEW_ENHANCEMENT_FLAG
flags.description: Adding enhacement filter preprocessing to input Texture from camera

flags.name: CAMERA_EXPORT_CALLBACKS
flags.description: Toggles the export callbacks in camera encoder

flags.name: DS_TEXT_IMPLEMENTATION
flags.description: Adding Text Widget

flags.name: DS_SLIDER_IMPLEMENTATION
flags.description: Adding slider in DS

flags.name: FILTER_CONFIG
flags.description: Enable Filter Config for new structure

flags.name: DS_INPUT_WIDGET_IMPLEMENTATION
flags.description: Adding onput widget

flags.name: CAMERA_SECONDARY_INPUT
flags.description: Adding secondary input support in camera. Use case - Duet

flags.name: DS_COLOR_WIDGET_IMPLEMENTATION
flags.description: Adding color widget DS

flags.name: DS_ICONS_USING_ATEXTURE
flags.description: Loading Design Studio icons using ATexture, instead of Renderer support

flags.name: AI_LIB_IOS_INTEGRATION
flags.description: Flag for iOS x AI-Lib integration

flags.name: LOG_TO_FILE
flags.description: Flag indicating should log to file

flags.name: DELETE_LOG_FILE
flags.description: Flag for deleting existing log file from production apps

flags.name: LENS_STUDIO
flags.description: Lens studio app. Requires DS_ICONS_MANAGER, DS_ICONS_USING_ATEXTURE and MAC_UI_ARCHITECTURE turned on

flags.name: FFMPEG_HWACCEL
flags.description: Flag for enabling Hardware acceleration in ffmpeg based decoders HIGHLY_EXPERIMENTAL

flags.name: COLOR_FILTER_VIDEO_PLAY_PAUSE
flags.description: Play pause activity for color filter video

flags.name: COLOR_FILTER_SCRIPT
flags.description: Applies color filter through scripting if set to ON
